name: Progressing
description: Progressing is a goal setting app.  We have given you the tools necessary to create and manage your own goals.

name: SongBirdie
description: SongBirdie is a collaboration project that allows you to have a personal, mobile songbook at your fingertips.

name: Daily Planner
description: The Daily Planner is a simple work-day tracker.  It lets you organize your day - everyday.

name: Game & GIF
description: Game and GIF was my first collaboration project, a website that allows you to explore one game at depth.

name: Employee Directory
description: The Employee Directory is the first React application I built.  And shows whats possible when given React and a dataset.

name: Password Generator
description: My Password Generator isn't groundbreaking - but I like keep it around as a reminder of how far I have come in my development journey.
